verbs.description: why designer carrie hammer [V: is] shaking up fashion week american designer carrie hammer suggests we ’re tackling fashion rigid beauty standards from the wrong angle entirely instead of focusing on how models look hammer insists we should care about what models do and who they are it this sentiment that inspired her rolemodelsnotrunwaymodels campaign which promotes the belief that models should inspire success not aesthetic beauty carrie hammer fashion
